scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production eleventy --input=src --output=dist && postcss src/styles/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/styles.css && node scripts/minify-html.js
scripts.validate: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js'); const supabaseUrl = process.env.SUPABASE_URL; const supabaseKey = process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY; const supabase = createClient(supabaseUrl, supabaseKey); console.log('Supabase client created successfully');"
